title: Ticket #3877: Param system completeness test
description:
Param System Initialization Check

We want to make sure we have all the known default settings and all the current knobs defined as NULL fro the start.

As a side effect we now have the minimal set of knobs to bring up a personal condor and we feel it could be smaller. See ticket #3883
check_ins:

Within the personal condor module we now can define a minimal set of knobs to bring it up. Though long term this test is a default know value test, we would like to catch new knows [...] (By Bill Taylor )
